title: Architect system design: Docker containerization strategy
description:
## Docker Containerization Strategy - Local Task Manager

### Architecture Overview

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                         Docker Host                             │
│                                                                 │
│  ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐   │
│  │                   Docker Network (bridge)               │   │
│  │                                                         │   │
│  │  ┌─────────────────┐       ┌─────────────────────┐      │   │
│  │  │  Frontend       │       │  Backend            │      │   │
│  │  │  Container      │───────│  Container          │      │   │
│  │  │                 │ HTTP  │                     │      │   │
│  │  │  - React App    │ API   │  - FastAPI          │      │   │
│  │  │  - Nginx        │ ────> │  - /api/v1/*        │      │   │
│  │  │  - Port 80      │       │  - Data Service     │      │   │
│  │  └─────────────────┘       └─────────────────────┘      │   │
│  │         │                           │                   │   │
│  └─────────┼───────────────────────────┼───────────────────┘   │
│            │                           │                       │
│  ┌─────────▼───────────────────────────▼───────────────────┐   │
│  │                    Docker Volume                        │   │
│  │                  (taskmgr-data)                         │   │
│  │                                                         │   │
│  │  /data/                                                 │   │
│  │  ├── tasks.json         (Task data)                     │   │
│  │  ├── projects.json      (Project data)                  │   │
│  │  ├── settings.json      (UI settings)                   │   │
│  │  └── backups/                                           │   │
│  └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘   │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

### Container Specifications

#### 1. Frontend Container
| Property | Value |
|----------|-------|
| Base Image | node:20-alpine (builder) + nginx:alpine (production) |
| Development Port | 5173 |
| Production Port | 80 |
| Build Context | ./frontend |
| Build File | frontend/Dockerfile |

**Dockerfile (Multi-stage Build):**
```dockerfile
# Build stage
FROM node:20-alpine AS builder
WORKDIR /app
COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm ci --only=production && npm cache clean --force
COPY . .
RUN npm run build

# Production stage
FROM nginx:alpine
COPY --from=builder /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html
COPY nginx.conf /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
EXPOSE 80
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD wget --no-verbose --tries=1 --spider http://localhost:80/ || exit 1
CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]
```

**nginx.conf:**
```nginx
server {
    listen 80;
    server_name localhost;
    root /usr/share/nginx/html;
    index index.html;

    gzip on;
    gzip_types text/plain text/css application/json application/javascript;

    location ~* \.(js|css|png|jpg|jpeg|gif|ico|svg|woff|woff2)$ {
        expires 1y;
        add_header Cache-Control "public, immutable";
    }

    location / {
        try_files $uri $uri/ /index.html;
    }

    location /api/ {
        proxy_pass http://backend:8000/api;
        proxy_http_version 1.1;
        proxy_set_header Host $host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
    }
}
```

#### 2. Backend Container
| Property | Value |
|----------|-------|
| Base Image | python:3.11-slim |
| Application Port | 8000 |
| Data Directory | /data (mounted volume) |
| Build Context | ./backend |
| Build File | backend/Dockerfile |

**Dockerfile:**
```dockerfile
FROM python:3.11-slim

ENV PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE=1 \
    PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 \
    PIP_NO_CACHE_DIR=1 \
    PIP_DISABLE_PIP_VERSION_CHECK=1

WORKDIR /app

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    curl \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

COPY requirements.txt .
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

RUN mkdir -p /data && chmod 777 /data

COPY app ./app

EXPOSE 8000

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=10s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD curl -f http://localhost:8000/docs || exit 1

CMD ["uvicorn", "app.main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]
```

### docker-compose.yml Configuration

```yaml
version: "3.9"

services:
  backend:
    build: ./backend
    container_name: taskmgr-backend
    ports:
      - "8000:8000"
    volumes:
      - taskmgr-data:/data
    environment:
      - PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1
      - LOG_LEVEL=INFO
    restart: unless-stopped

  frontend:
    build: ./frontend
    container_name: taskmgr-frontend
    ports:
      - "5173:80"
    environment:
      - API_URL=http://backend:8000/api
    depends_on:
      - backend
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  taskmgr-data:
    name: taskmgr-data
    driver: local
```

### Development Mode Configuration

For local development with hot reload (outside Docker):

```bash
# Backend (in background)
cd backend
uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000

# Frontend (in foreground)
cd frontend
npm run dev
```

For Docker-based development:

```bash
# Development docker-compose
docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build
```

### Volume Management

```bash
# Create volume
docker volume create taskmgr-data

# Inspect volume
docker volume inspect taskmgr-data

# Backup data
docker run --rm \
  -v taskmgr-data:/data:ro \
  -v $(pwd):/backup \
  alpine tar czf /backup/backup-$(date +%Y%m%d).tar.gz /data

# Restore backup
docker stop taskmgr-backend taskmgr-frontend
docker run --rm \
  -v taskmgr-data:/data \
  -v $(pwd):/backup \
  alpine tar xzf /backup/backup-YYYYMMDD.tar.gz -C /
docker start taskmgr-backend taskmgr-frontend
```

### Build and Deployment Commands

```bash
# Build all images
docker compose build

# Build single service
docker compose build backend
docker compose build frontend

# Start all services
docker compose up -d

# Start with rebuild
docker compose up -d --build

# View logs
docker compose logs -f

# View logs for specific service
docker compose logs -f backend
docker compose logs -f frontend

# Stop all services
docker compose down

# Stop and remove volumes
docker compose down -v
```

### Port Mapping

| Service | Container Port | Host Port | Purpose |
|---------|---------------|-----------|---------|
| Frontend | 80 | 5173 | Web interface |
| Backend | 8000 | 8000 | API access |

### Security Considerations

1. **Network Security**: Containers communicate over Docker's internal network
2. **Data Security**: All data persisted to Docker volumes
3. **File System**: Backend runs as root (required for file operations on /data)

### Troubleshooting

```bash
# Check container health
docker ps
docker inspect --format="{{.State.Health.Status}}" taskmgr-backend

# Test network connectivity
docker exec taskmgr-frontend ping backend
docker exec taskmgr-frontend curl http://backend:8000/docs

# Verify volume exists
docker volume ls
docker volume inspect taskmgr-data

# Execute inside container
docker exec -it taskmgr-backend sh
docker exec -it taskmgr-frontend sh
```

### Files to Create

```
backend/
├── Dockerfile
├── requirements.txt
└── README.md

frontend/
├── Dockerfile
├── nginx.conf
└── README.md

docker-compose.yml
docker-compose.dev.yml (optional)
```

title: Epic: Architecture and Planning
description:
## Architecture and Planning Epic - Local Task Manager

### Overview
This epic covers the complete system architecture design for a single-user, containerized task management application. All design documents have been created and reviewed.

### Technology Stack Summary
| Component | Technology | Status |
|-----------|-----------|--------|
| Backend | FastAPI (Python 3.11+) | Selected |
| Frontend | React 19 + TypeScript + Vite | Selected |
| Containerization | Docker + docker-compose | Selected |
| Data Storage | JSON files with atomic writes | Selected |
| Styling | CSS Modules + CSS Variables | Selected |

### Architecture Documents Created
1. `/Users/msaum/ai_testbed_task_manager/designs/backend-api.md` - Backend API design with FastAPI
2. `/Users/msaum/ai_testbed_task_manager/designs/docker-architecture.md` - Docker containerization strategy
3. `/Users/msaum/ai_testbed_task_manager/designs/frontend-stack.md` - Frontend React/TypeScript structure
4. `/Users/msaum/ai_testbed_task_manager/designs/integration.md` - Frontend-backend integration patterns

### Implementation Status
- Backend models (Task, Project, Settings): **COMPLETE**
- Storage layer (JSON files with atomic writes): **COMPLETE**
- Custom exceptions (BackendError, StorageError, etc.): **COMPLETE**
- Frontend React structure: **INITIAL** - Basic skeleton in place
- Frontend types: **NEEDS IMPLEMENTATION**
- Frontend hooks: **NEEDS IMPLEMENTATION**
- Frontend components: **NEEDS IMPLEMENTATION**
- Docker configuration: **NEEDS IMPLEMENTATION**

### Blocked Tasks
All frontend and backend implementation tasks are blocked on this epic's completion.

### Next Steps
1. Complete backend: Create main FastAPI app, routers, and services
2. Complete frontend: Implement task list, detail drawer, and project selector
3. Create Docker configuration files
4. Implement integration patterns between frontend and backend
